raw_data.comments: [A3031] Albert Bridge Road (Both directions) at the junction of [A3212] Chelsea Embankment - Traffic delays due to road closures in the area. Buses are diverted via Chelsea Bridge.
raw_data.current_update: Traffic is slow moving on approach with southbound tailbacks towards Royal Hospital Road. Westbound delays from Lupus Street. Additionally delays are reported on Battersea Bridge Road due to various closures in the area eastbound tailbacks from King`s Road, northbound tailbacks towards Prince of Wales Drive, westbound tailbacks from Royal Hospital Road and southbound tailbacks from Chelsea Park Gardens. Delays are expected.
